🌱 **Plant Watering Reminders**


📅 **Due Today:**
🌸 *Ivy Geranium (Balcony)* (Outdoor balcony with full sun to partial shade)
   💡 Thrives in bright, direct sunlight and well-draining soil. Allow the top layer of soil to dry slightly between waterings. Deadhead spent flowers to promote continuous blooming; pinch back leggy stems; protect from frost.
🌿 *Peacock Plant (Indoor)* (Bright, indirect light indoors with high humidity)
   💡 Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged; use filtered or rainwater to prevent leaf tip browning; maintain humidity above 60%; avoid direct sun; dust leaves regularly to promote healthy photosynthesis.
🌴 *Dragon Tree (Indoor Corner)* (Bright, indirect light indoors; avoid drafts)
   💡 Use well-draining soil; allow top 2-3 cm of soil to dry between waterings; avoid waterlogged conditions to prevent root rot; maintain moderate humidity; wipe leaves to remove dust; rotate periodically for even growth; feed lightly during active season.
🌵 *Flaming Katy (Indoor Window)* (Bright, indirect light indoors near a window)
   💡 Use a well-draining succulent mix; allow the top 2-3 cm of soil to dry out between waterings; provide bright light or filtered sun; remove spent blooms to encourage new flowering; feed monthly with diluted balanced fertilizer; keep temperatures between 15-24 °C.
🪴 *Spider Plant (Indoor Table)* (Bright, indirect light indoors)
   💡 Use well-draining potting mix; allow the top 2 cm of soil to dry between waterings; maintain moderate humidity; trim any brown leaf tips; rotate pot periodically for even growth; remove and propagate plantlets to encourage fuller foliage.
🌵 *Tree Aeonium (Shelf)* (Bright, indirect light indoors or sunny windowsill)
   💡 Plant in a well-draining succulent mix; allow soil to dry out completely between waterings; provide bright light and avoid cold drafts; remove spent rosettes at stem base; repot when rootbound.


🌍 Current Season: ☀️ Summer

💡 **Tip of the day:** ☀️ Check soil moisture before watering

🌱 **Plant Care Update**

All your plants are happy and well-watered! 🎉

🌱 **Plant Watering Reminders**


📅 **Due Today:**
🌿 *Peacock Plant (Indoor)* (Bright, indirect light indoors with high humidity)
   💡 Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged; use filtered or rainwater to prevent leaf tip browning; maintain humidity above 60%; avoid direct sun; dust leaves regularly to promote healthy photosynthesis.
🪴 *Spider Plant (Indoor Table)* (Bright, indirect light indoors)
   💡 Use well-draining potting mix; allow the top 2 cm of soil to dry between waterings; maintain moderate humidity; trim any brown leaf tips; rotate pot periodically for even growth; remove and propagate plantlets to encourage fuller foliage.


⏰ **Coming Up (Next 2 Days):**
🌴 *Dragon Tree (Indoor Corner)* (Bright, indirect light indoors; avoid drafts)


🌍 Current Season: ☀️ Summer

💡 **Tip of the day:** ☀️ Check soil moisture before watering

   💡 Use well-draining soil; allow top 2-3 cm of soil to dry between waterings; avoid waterlogged conditions to prevent root rot; maintain moderate humidity; wipe leaves to remove dust; rotate periodically for even growth; feed lightly during active season.

🌱 **Plant Watering Reminders**


📅 **Due Today:**
🌿 *Peacock Plant (Indoor)* (Bright, indirect light indoors with high humidity)
   💡 Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged; use filtered or rainwater to prevent leaf tip browning; maintain humidity above 60%; avoid direct sun; dust leaves regularly to promote healthy photosynthesis.
🌵 *Flaming Katy (Indoor Window)* (Bright, indirect light indoors near a window)
   💡 Use a well-draining succulent mix; allow the top 2-3 cm of soil to dry out between waterings; provide bright light or filtered sun; remove spent blooms to encourage new flowering; feed monthly with diluted balanced fertilizer; keep temperatures between 15-24 °C.
🪴 *Spider Plant (Indoor Table)* (Bright, indirect light indoors)
   💡 Use well-draining potting mix; allow the top 2 cm of soil to dry between waterings; maintain moderate humidity; trim any brown leaf tips; rotate pot periodically for even growth; remove and propagate plantlets to encourage fuller foliage.
🌵 *Tree Aeonium (Shelf)* (Bright, indirect light indoors or sunny windowsill)
   💡 Plant in a well-draining succulent mix; allow soil to dry out completely between waterings; provide bright light and avoid cold drafts; remove spent rosettes at stem base; repot when rootbound.

🌴 *Dragon Tree (Indoor Corner)* (Bright, indirect light indoors; avoid drafts)
